TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ColorDialog extends System.Windows.Forms.CommonDialog

summary.span: 表示一个通用对话框，该对话框显示可用的颜色以及允许用户定义自定义颜色的控件。

span.span: Represents a common dialog box that displays available colors along with controls that enable the user to define custom colors.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 继承的成员必须调用来创建此特定的通用对话框。The inherited member must be invoked to create this specific common dialog box. 可以重写以实现特定的对话框挂钩功能。 can be overridden to implement specific dialog box hook functionality. 使用检索用户选定的颜色。Use to retrieve the color selected by the user. 当你创建的实例，一些读/写属性被设置为初始值。When you create an instance of , some of the read/write properties are set to initial values. 有关这些值的列表，请参阅构造函数。For a list of these values, see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的示例说明如何创建新。The following example illustrates the creation of new . 此示例需要具有的现有窗体中的方法调用从和在其上放置。This example requires that the method is called from within an existing form that has a and placed on it. [!code-cpp[Classic ColorDialog Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ColorDialog Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ColorDialog Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ColorDialog Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ColorDialog Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ColorDialog Example/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你创建的实例，以下的读/写属性设置为初始值。When you create an instance of , the following read/write properties are set to initial values. |PropertyProperty|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`true`| ||`false`| ||`Color.Black`| ||`null`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`false`| 你可以更改任何通过单独属性调用这些属性的值。You can change the value for any of these properties through a separate call to the property.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示用户是否可以使用该对话框定义自定义颜色。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user can use the dialog box to define custom colors.

value.span: 如果用户可定义自定义颜色，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the user can define custom colors; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当设置为`false`、 在对话框中的关联的按钮被禁用，而且用户不能访问在对话框中的自定义颜色控件。When set to `false`, the associated button in the dialog box is disabled and the user cannot access the custom colors control in the dialog box. ## Examples 下面的示例说明如何创建新。The following example illustrates the creation of new . 此示例需要具有的现有窗体中的方法调用从和在其上放置。This example requires that the method is called from within an existing form that has a and placed on it. [!code-cpp[Classic ColorDialog Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ColorDialog Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ColorDialog Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ColorDialog Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ColorDialog Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ColorDialog Example/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示对话框是否显示基本颜色集中可用的所有颜色。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the dialog box displays all available colors in the set of basic colors.

value.span: 如果对话框显示基本颜色集中可用的所有颜色，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the dialog box displays all available colors in the set of basic colors; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何初始化设置，属性。The following code example demonstrates initializing a setting the , properties. 不的允许用户设置自定义颜色，但它启用的整套显示基本颜色。The does not enable the user to set a custom color, but it enables the full set of basic colors be displayed. 当你将设置属性`false`，它允许在具有 256 系统上其他颜色的组合的颜色显示，或小于颜色。When you set the property to `false`, it enables the display of colors that are combinations of other colors on systems with 256 or less colors. 该示例还演示如何设置属性和处理为对话的事件。The example also shows setting the property and handling a event for a dialog. 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴在窗体和调用`InitializeColorDialog`窗体的构造函数中的方法或`Load`方法。To run the example, paste the following code in a form and call the `InitializeColorDialog` method in the form's constructor or `Load` method. 此示例需要`Click`该按钮的事件连接到示例中定义的事件处理程序方法。This example requires that the `Click` event of the button is connected to the event-handler method defined in the example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ColorDialogHelp#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ColorDialogHelp/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ColorDialogHelp#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ColorDialogHelp/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ColorDialogHelp#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ColorDialogHelp/VB/form1.vb#1)]

span.span: If a color is not selected, the default value is black.

summary.span: 获取或设置对话框中显示的自定义颜色集。

span.span: Gets or sets the set of custom colors shown in the dialog box.

value.span: 对话框显示的自定义颜色集。

span.span: A set of custom colors shown by the dialog box.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用户可以创建其自己的自定义颜色集。Users can create their own set of custom colors. 中包含这些颜色组成创建颜色所需的 BGR （蓝色，绿色、 红色） 值。These colors are contained in an composed of the BGR (blue, green, red) values necessary to create the color. 此数据的结构的详细信息，请参阅。For more information on the structure of this data, see . 如果可以仅定义自定义颜色设置为`true`。Custom colors can only be defined if is set to `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何添加类型的数组表示为自定义颜色。The following code example shows how to add an array of type representing custom colors to . 此示例需要代码内运行从。This example requires that the code is run from within a . [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ColorDialog CustomColors Property Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ColorDialog CustomColors Property Example/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ColorDialog CustomColors Property Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ColorDialog CustomColors Property Example/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ColorDialog CustomColors Property Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ColorDialog CustomColors Property Example/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示用于创建自定义颜色的控件在对话框打开时是否可见。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the controls used to create custom colors are visible when the dialog box is opened

value.span: 如果自定义颜色控件在对话框打开时是可用的，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the custom color controls are available when the dialog box is opened; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，自定义颜色控件都不可见时首次打开对话框。By default, the custom color controls are not visible when the dialog box is first opened. 你必须单击`Custom Colors`按钮来显示它们。You must click the `Custom Colors` button to display them. > [!NOTE] > 如果是`false`，然后不起作用。If is `false`, then has no effect.

summary.span: 获取基础窗口实例句柄 (HINSTANCE)。

value.span: 包含窗口句柄的 HINSTANCE 值的 。

span.span: An that contains the HINSTANCE value of the window handle.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 此方法使用，防止它调用不受信任代码; 只能直接调用方需要具有权限。This method uses to prevent it from being called from untrusted code; only the immediate caller is required to have permission. 如果可以从部分受信任代码调用你的代码，将用户输入不传递类而不进行验证的方法。If your code can be called from partially trusted code, do not pass user input to class methods without validation. 有关在将使用的重要限制`LinkDemand`成员，请参阅[Demand vs。LinkDemand](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1ab877f2-70f4-4e0d-8116-943999dfe8f5)。For important limitations on using the `LinkDemand` member, see [Demand vs. LinkDemand](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1ab877f2-70f4-4e0d-8116-943999dfe8f5). 此属性还使用安全特性; 若要重写此成员，派生的类必须具有`CustomPermission`权限。This property also uses the security attribute; to override this member, the derived class must have the `CustomPermission` permission.

permission.span: 用于操作与非托管代码。

span.span: for operating with unmanaged code.
Associated enumeration:

summary.span: 将所有选项重新设置为其默认值，将最后选定的颜色重新设置为黑色，将自定义颜色重新设置为其默认值。

span.span: Resets all options to their default values, the last selected color to black, and the custom colors to their default values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性是适用于使用 256 或更少的颜色的系统。This property is applicable to systems with 256 or fewer colors. 这些类型的系统，在某些颜色是复合服务的其他人。On these types of systems, some colors are composites of others. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何初始化设置，属性。The following code example demonstrates initializing a setting the , properties. 不的允许用户设置自定义颜色，但它启用的整套显示基本颜色。The does not enable the user to set a custom color, but it enables the full set of basic colors be displayed. 当你将设置属性`false`，它允许在具有 256 系统上其他颜色的组合的颜色显示，或小于颜色。When you set the property to `false`, it enables the display of colors that are combinations of other colors on systems with 256 or less colors. 该示例还演示如何设置属性和处理对话框中的事件。The example also shows setting the property and handling a event for a dialog box. 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴在窗体和调用`InitializeColorDialog`窗体的构造函数中的方法或`Load`方法。To run the example, paste the following code in a form and call the `InitializeColorDialog` method in the form's constructor or `Load` method. 此示例需要`Click`该按钮的事件连接到示例中定义的事件处理程序方法。This example requires the `Click` event of the button is connected to the event-handler method defined in the example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ColorDialogHelp#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ColorDialogHelp/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ColorDialogHelp#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ColorDialogHelp/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ColorDialogHelp#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ColorDialogHelp/VB/form1.vb#1)]
